item.title: WAHA 2025.3
item.description:
Weâ€™re excited to roll out WAHA 2025.3!

GOWS 1.0

GOWS Engine just got its 1.0 moment!

Hereâ€™s whatâ€™s new:

  • Enable Link Previews - #763
  • Delete Status Message - #754
  • Delete Message - #796
  • Edit Message - #797
  • Reply To Message - #799
  • Add filename on /api/sendFile - #853
  • Extract replyTo - #876

NOWEB Stability

If you faced any issues with the NOWEB engine, like #821 , #860 , #869 we have fixed them in this release!

item.title: WAHA 2024.7 - WhatsApp Channels API, JSON logs
item.description:
ðŸŽ‰ We are thrilled to announce the release of WAHA 2024.7 ðŸŽ‰

WhatsApp Channels API

WAHA now supports WhatsApp Channels - a brand-new feature introduced by WhatsApp. You can manage, read and send messages to WhatsApp Channels (aka Newsletters) via API.
